alert.note: Alert for McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:57AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tippah, northwestern Prentiss, Alcorn and southwestern McNairy Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1157 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Theo, or 10 miles south of Big Hill Pond State Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Big Hill Pond State Park, Jumpertown, Glen, Hinkle, Theo, Farmington, Walnut, Falkner, Guys, Rienzi, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Strickland, Collinstown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Jobes and Gaston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
